I am a size S in most shirts , sometimes an M. I ordered a size M. I couldn't even pull it below my armpits, I got stuck. This size M would fit a 10 yr old skinny girl! My measurements are ch 36, w 28, h 33 , Looking at this garment I'm thinking XL for that measurement...maybe  Too bad because otherwise it's a good shirt, so order at least 2 sizes up! (also because the fabric only stretches a little.  The images show my other shirt from a different brand comparing it to this item...both M, as you can see on the tags. 评论概述: Still using tag hanger plastic for strap
评论详情: It's a cool concept but they're not executing well. The shirt I received was still using a tag hanger plastic (the single strand of white). The fabric is okay. I wasn't expecting luxury, and I didn't get luxury. It's definitely cut for a specific type of body. If you don't look like the models in the pictures it's not going to fit that well.
Like many other have shared. The shirt run SEVERAL sizes too small and the returns aren’t as simple as others. I believe you need to print a label vs just dropping it off.
When I opened the pkg I wasn’t even sure the shirt would fit, but it did and it’s cute!!

Variation in outfits is our goal! My 15-year-old daughter wanted this "aesthetic tank" (she loves the word "aesthetic"). It has its good qualities, with some criticisms.  The fabric is sort of OK. If you're looking for a long-term top, for several seasons, I am afraid this one will probably not work. But if you have a teen, or if you just needs something for maybe 2 seasonal cycles, I think this works all right. The feel is soft enough, with a decent stretch. But the fabric itself, and the stitching, feel kind of fragile. After washing/drying a few times, I can see some fraying.  The sizing is a bit smaller than what's stated in the product description. My daughter is fine with this, because she prefers a tighter fit anyway. But it's very close to not being right, and depending on what you like it might be of by almost a full size.  The "invisible" idea actually does work well. Not perfectly, of course, but it does pretty much disappear against your shoulders.  This is an OK shirt, with a tight fit, and a decent "invisible" element.
This top is comically small. It was tight enough that it was difficult to breathe. I think this might be a children's shirt.
Cheaply made-straps made of plastic tag holders. I returned immediately
Very cute but no stretch. So when u order make sure to factor  that in

This top is so cute however it does run very small so keep that in mind when selecting the proper sizing. It’s a ribbed style tank top with clear straps midway on the straps. You can wear it both day and night depending on how you style it, but it’s a sexy style and something I would wear with a pair of jeans and not a skirt. The shirt is trendy and a great dupe for a $250 top I’ve seen online. The black is a true black color.

I had to take away 1 star and that's because it runs small.  I could barely get it over my head.  Once I finally got it on I can tell it's a winner but only in the right size.  Unique design.  Sexy yet sophisticated.  Dress it up or down.  Good fabric.  But I couldn't keep it on for longer than 5 mins because it's just suffocatingly tight.  So I HIGHLY  recommend you go up a size or two.  Other than that you'll love this tank top.
